mapper.update: update manager_log set operator = #{operator,jdbcType=CHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=CHAR}, method_type = #{methodType,jdbcType=CHAR}, input_data = #{inputData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, output_data = #{outputData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exception_type = #{exceptionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, exception_message = #{exceptionMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select log_id, operator, operate_time, method_name, method_type, input_data, output_data, exception_type, exception_message from manager_log where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select log_id, operator, operate_time, method_name, method_type, input_data, output_data, exception_type, exception_message from manager_log
